Public Interface IOrderedEnumerable(Of TElement) Implements IEnumerable(Of TElement)
generic <typename TElement> public interface class IOrderedEnumerable : System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<TElement>
type IOrderedEnumerable<'Element> = interface interface seq<'Element> interface IEnumerable

span.span: The type of the elements of the sequence.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此類型是可列舉的因為它繼承自。This type is enumerable because it inherits from . 擴充方法並類型的物件上運作。The extension methods and operate on objects of type . 型別的物件可以藉由呼叫其中一個主要排序方法，取得或是，都會傳回。An object of type can be obtained by calling one of the primary sort methods, or , which return an . 並，從屬的排序方法，接著還會傳回型別的物件。 and , the subordinate sort methods, in turn also return an object of type . 此設計可讓任意數目的連續呼叫或，其中每個呼叫會執行次級從先前的呼叫所傳回的已排序資料所用的順序。This design allows for any number of consecutive calls to or , where each call performs a subordinate ordering on the sorted data returned from the previous call. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何執行主要和次要上的排序字串陣列。The following example demonstrates how to perform a primary and secondary ordering on an array of strings. 它也會示範，產生是可列舉。It also demonstrates that the resulting is enumerable. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法所提供的功能所提供的或是，這取決於是否`descending`是`true`或`false`。The functionality provided by this method is like that provided by or , depending on whether `descending` is `true` or `false`. 兩者都執行從屬的已排序的順序的型別所用的排序。They both perform a subordinate ordering of an already sorted sequence of type . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用上執行次要排序。The following code example demonstrates how to use to perform a secondary ordering on an .
